name: Alzheimer Boxers
description:
Two grandpas want to box each other, but they've forgotten how to do that.

First, remember your old moves - Attack, Stamina and Defense. Then use those moves in the battle!

Make sure to remember each sequence perfectly, since every move sequence will NOT be visible when the battle starts.

Team project, made for a 24-hour Ubisoft game jam. July, 2022.

IMPORTANT: The game's resolution is broken on smaller screens. If that is the case for you, play this game on the following LINK.
